data.name: Everyday Direct account
data.description: Your everyday transaction account with VISA Debit access.

features.additionalInfo: You can apply to have an overdraft (RediCredit) linked to the Everyday Direct account. All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria and fees and charges apply. For full details visit our website.

features.additionalValue: Track payments with SMS and email alerts

features.additionalInfo: Our sweep service automatically transfers funds from certain savings accounts to cover most transactions which would otherwise exceed your transaction account's available balance.
Make deposits and withdrawals through a Bank@Post facility at Australia Post outlets. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges apply.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to current or retired employees of the Australian education sector or family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Bank.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.

fees.name: CASH_ADVANCES_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Visa Debit and Visa Credit card cash advances at other financial institutions in Australia and overseas. Individual bank branches may not offer this service and may charge additional fees (at cost).

fees.name: INTERNATIONAL_CONVERSION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: 2.90% of transaction value in $AUD collected by Cuscal Limited - 0.90% paid to Us; 1.00% retained by Cuscal; 1.00% paid to Visa International. Payable when you transact in a foreign currency using your Visa card either online or at a merchant point of sale (irrespective of where the transaction occurs; performed not in Australian Dollar; or overseas merchants transact in a foreign currency.)

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: BANK_CHEQUE
fees.additionalInfo: Issue fee for each cheque drawn.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $50 per hour (minimum charge $25). Additional accounting services on your account at your request.

fees.name: SECURITY_TOKEN_REPLACEMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for a security token that is lost, stolen or damaged.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The overdraft (RediCredit) interest rate that applies to any overdrawn amounts.
